verses.verse: הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> O praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> all ye nations שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ <S%H7623><s%> praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H523><s%> him all ye people

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for גָ֘בַ֤ר <S%H1396><s%> is great עָלֵ֨ינוּ ׀ <S%H5921><s%> toward חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> For his merciful וֶֽאֱמֶת־ <S%H571><s%> toward us and the truth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
